meanings.definition: Extremely small or tiny in size
meanings.sent1: The ant carried the bitsiest crumb back to its nest.
meanings.sent2: The fairy had the bitsiest wings you could imagine.
meanings.sent3: The bitsiest kitten tried to meow like a lion.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was the bitsiest whisper in the noisy room.
meanings.sent5: The bitsiest star in the sky twinkled faintly.

meanings.definition: Of the smallest amount or degree possible
meanings.sent1: He only had the bitsiest piece of cake left.
meanings.sent2: She took the bitsiest sip of tea before leaving.
meanings.sent3: The bitsiest raindrop fell from the cloudless sky.
meanings.sent4: His smile was the bitsiest hint of amusement.
meanings.sent5: The bitsiest smile brightened her face.
